OFFICIAL BMC MERCH: http://bit.ly/BMCmerch

#BlackMagicCraft #Episode161 #TRASH

In this video I scratch build a couple miniature dumpsters for tabletop gaming. These are pretty much all made out of paper products.


Some specific items used in this build that might not be on my Essential Equipment page:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

CORRUGATED PAPER
(USA) https://amzn.to/2J3WhxY
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2X3MVw2
(UK) https://amzn.to/2NdNYFg
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2IM7XGN

CHIPBOARD
(USA) https://amzn.to/2BZ6Xdw
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2SxfITf
(UK) https://amzn.to/2R8hmOL
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2CNjNNP

METALLIC GEL PENS
I was going to try and find links to these but it's so hard to know online if they are the right kind. I suggest going to a local store where you can actually test the pens out before buying.

title: Making Miniature DUMPSTERS for Kill Team, Warhammer, Necromunda, Gaslands, or The Walking Dead
